Package items

Class Item

java.lang.Object
items.Item
public class Item extends Object
Provides the data and methods necessary for an interactive item.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description

    Instantiates a new copy of an item.

    Instantiates a new item.

  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item(String name, String description, int amount, int turnsToUse, boolean canPickUp, boolean canUse)
      Instantiates a new item.
      Parameters:
      name - The item's name.
      description - The item's description.
      amount - How many items there are.
      turnsToUse - The number of turns to use.
      canPickUp - Whether the item can be picked up.
      canUse - Whether the item can be used.

    • Item

      public Item(Item item)
      Instantiates a new copy of an item.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to copy.

  • Method Details

    • canPickUp

      public boolean canPickUp()
      Returns whether or not the player can pick this item up.
      Returns:
      True if the item can be picked up, false otherwise.

    • canUse

      public boolean canUse()
      Returns whether or not the player can use this item.
      Returns:
      True if the item can be used, false otherwise.

    • turnsToUse

      public int turnsToUse()
      Returns the number of turns it takes for the player to use this item.
      Returns:
      The number of turns used.

    • getAmount

      public int getAmount()
      Returns the number of items available.
      Returns:
      The number of items.

    • setAmount

      public void setAmount(int amount)
      Sets the number of items available.
      Parameters:
      amount - The new number of items.

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      Returns this item's description.
      Returns:
      The description.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns this item's name.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      The name.

    • getItem

      public static Item getItem(String name)
      Gets an item from either the player or the room (player prioritized).
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the item to get.
      Returns:
      The item, or null if not found.

    • removeFromInventory

      public static void removeFromInventory(String name)
      Removes an item from either the player's or the room's inventory (player prioritized). Assumes the item exists.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the item to remove.
